intro.start.1.expanded: Welcome to the world of Pokémon—teeming with creatures of wonder and mystery!
intro.start.1.speaker: prof

intro.start.2.expanded: My name is Rowan—though in these parts, most simply call me the Pokémon Professor.
intro.start.2.speaker: prof

intro.rival.intro.expanded: Your energetic friend was dashing about earlier, looking for you with unusual urgency.
intro.rival.intro.speaker: mom

intro.lake.plan.expanded: C'mon {PLAYER}! To the lake—we might find a super-rare Pokémon today!
intro.lake.plan.speaker: rival

cyrus.lake.silent.expanded: A silent figure gazes across the lake... His eyes are distant—measuring, calculating—before he even notices you're here.
cyrus.lake.silent.speaker: narration

cyrus.lake.depart.expanded: ...A future shaped by will alone—no chaos, no frailty of spirit... Hmph. This place will play its role soon enough.
cyrus.lake.depart.speaker: cyrus

rival.lake.cyrus.react.expanded: What was THAT guy's deal? Total ice-core vibes. Anyway—hey, is that a briefcase?
rival.lake.cyrus.react.speaker: rival

intro.briefcase.expanded: Somebody left a briefcase here... We should retur—whoa, wild Pokémon incoming!
intro.briefcase.speaker: rival

intro.briefcase.assistant.expanded: Professor Rowan's briefcase—he must have left it behind when he was studying the lake!
intro.briefcase.assistant.speaker: assistant

intro.rowan.arrival.expanded: Ah! My briefcase! I was dreadfully careless... You two are in danger—open it and choose a Pokémon at once!
intro.rowan.arrival.speaker: rowan

intro.choose.starter.expanded: Quick—choose a Pokémon from the briefcase so we can defend ourselves!
intro.choose.starter.speaker: rival

intro.after.battle.expanded: We pulled through! Your Pokémon really carried us there—nice!
intro.after.battle.speaker: rival

intro.rowan.intervene.expanded: Stop right there! Venturing into tall grass without a Pokémon of your own is far too dangerous.
intro.rowan.intervene.speaker: rowan

intro.assistant.approach.expanded: Professor—those are the two we saw by the lake earlier.
intro.assistant.approach.speaker: assistant

intro.rowan.present.expanded: Hmm... Very well. I left my briefcase at the lake, but I retrieved it. Choose a partner Pokémon from inside so you may travel safely.
intro.rowan.present.speaker: rowan

intro.mom.running_shoes.expanded: Take these Running Shoes—may they carry you swiftly on your journey.
intro.mom.running_shoes.speaker: mom
